location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'CS 'LADY DENISON PENDER' DIVERSION OF BUSHIRE-HENJAM OUT OF HENJAM INTO BAHRAIN'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: A pencil number enclosed in a circle is located in the top right hand corner of the recto of the folio.Materials: 1 blue tracing sheetDimensions: 520mm x 335mm

mods.abstract: Tracing showing the diversion of the Bushire-Henjam submarine cable into Bahrain Harbour. The route of the cable is marked with a thick white line.Remarks: All soundings in feet. Shore end laid by tug and lighter. Tracing from Chart No. 20. Buoys not to be relied upon.Also included at the bottom of the tracing is information about the first and second splices of the cable including longitudes, latitudes and soundings. Other technical information regarding the laying of the cable is also given.
